title: Started 'What I Am Doing' Project
description: Began the development of a personal timeline application to track my activities and projects.

title: Set Up Project Structure
description: Created the initial file and folder structure for the web application, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files.

title: Designed the User Interface
description: Crafted the basic UI and styling for the application, focusing on a clean and modern look.

title: Implemented Timeline Feature
description: Developed the JavaScript logic to fetch task data and dynamically generate the timeline on the page.
